edited_stories.edited_story_text: The family had such a great time. The kids were excited to come together, the food prepared was insanely good this time around, and even the baby was overwhelmed with joy, especially after seeing her father. After it all, everyone still had that lingering high. Well, except the dog, who was tuckered out by all the excitement.
